data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peterson, Paul M., Soreng, Robert J. (2018): Poalaegaardiana, a new species from Ecuador (Poaceae, Pooideae, Poeae, Poinae). PhytoKeys 100: 141-147, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.100.25387, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.100.25387
